gameFiles
Class Map

java.lang.Object
  gameFiles.Map

public class Map
extends java.lang.Object

The Map Class is a container for the HashSets of Edges and Nodes that make up the playing field of the game. It also allows for easy access to random nodes and edges.

Author:
MPatashnik

Constructor Summary

          Constructor for use without an attached game.

public Map()

readMap

public static Map readMap(Game g,
                          java.io.File f)
                   throws java.io.IOException
Reads the Map in File f, creates it, and returns it

Parameters:
g - - the Game this map will belong to
f - - the Text file with the map in it
